TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Cipawkan, title = Cipawkan, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cipawkan} }

S.FORM: Cipawkan Itiniay i Hualien Cen no Hualien ko Cipawkan a niyaro', 2,448 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 6,662 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 16 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 1,051 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 84 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5,611 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis13 , Truku2 , roma0.5 . Ira ko picodadan( , ) i niyaro'. Ira ko kofa( , ) i niyaro'.
